original:
The International Journal of Astrobiology, published by Cambridge University Press, serves as a forum for practitioners in the interdisciplinary field of astrobiology.
- Astrobiology, published by Mary Ann Liebert, Inc., provides insights and research findings relevant to the study of life in the universe.
sampled: The International Journal of Astrobiology, published by Cambridge University Press, serves as a forum for analysts in the holistic field of astrobiology. - Astrobiology, published by Mary Ann Outlet, Inc., gives insights and research artifacts relevant to the study of life in this universe.
